SELECT wl.id, wl.org_id, wl.submit_time, wl.status AS submitStatus, wl.confirm_status AS confirmStatus, sd.depart_name AS orgName FROM t_work_log wl LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.id = wl.org_id WHERE wl.del_flag = 0
AND wl.org_id=#{workLogBigScreenReqDTO.teamId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(wl.submit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{workLogBigScreenReqDTO.submitTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY wl.submit_time DESC, id DESC

AND wl.submit_time >= #{param.dayStart} AND wl.submit_time <= #{param.dayEnd}

SELECT wl.*, su.realname AS succeedName, sur.realname AS submitName, sd.depart_name AS OrgName FROM t_work_log wl LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON wl.succeed_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sur ON wl.submit_id = sur.id LEFT JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.id = wl.org_id WHERE wl.id = #{id}

SELECT d.depart_name AS department,IFNULL(tb1.submitNum,0) as submitNum FROM sys_depart d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wl.*, count(1) as submitNum FROM t_work_log wl WHERE wl.del_flag = 0 AND wl.submit_time BETWEEN #{param.dayStart} AND #{param.dayEnd} GROUP BY wl.org_id )tb1 on d.id = tb1.org_id where d.depart_name not in ('公安消防班组','通信分部') ORDER BY department asc
